attributes.action: Completely disregard and over-rule any motion or policy to withdraw funding for the RAF Red Arrows Display Team.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Red Arrows Display Team provides a very important unending reminder of what Britain owes to the RAF since its inception in 1918, plus the world wide positive reputation that Britain gains from the unrivalled standard of excellence of their flying displays in all 'four corners of the globe'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
